roleset.name: cause to see

example.name: with WH-clause
example.text: The case exhibited how testing was being overused.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: It is reported that after it received the scientific achievement award of Heilongjiang 's Chinese Medicine Administrative Bureau in 1992 , the " Liver Healing Capsule " also received a top award at the Malaysia International New Technology and New Product Exhibition , and in May of this year , it received the gold medal at the third National Medical and Health Care Products Fair .

example.name: autogen1
example.text: The Soviets held export exhibitions that included high-tech itemsin New York and West Germany .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: an exhibition of the Guterman items

example.name: All args (in odd forms)
example.text: the Malaysia International New Technology and New Product Exhibition

example.name: with args 0 & 2
example.text: his exhibition to the general public

roleset.note: EXHIBIT-V NOTES: Not a perfect synonym for 'show'; show can take the ditransitive (showme this) but exhibit cannot (*exhibit me this).VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls reflexive_appearance-48.1.2. (from exhibit.01-v)
EXHIBITION-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls reflexive_appearance-48.1.2. (from exhibition.01-n)
